text:
@jameshohmann @ColbyItkowitz Isn't this perfect opportunity to blast TV ads (by @JoeBiden @MikeBloomberg @ProjectLincoln) comprised of Trump's lies and coverups on covid19 over and over and over?  

You know Trump is watching tv and they would make him boil over.
